festival.name: Love Festival
Dialogue.Evelyn: I still remember how I sent my first love letter to George.#$b#He wasn't stunned first.$s
Dialogue.Alex: I may not receive many letters this year but as soon as I become a professional, everyone wants to be mine.
Dialogue.Clint: Do you think Emily is going to give me her love letter?$3
Dialogue.Caroline: Unfortunately, Pierre doesn't have time to create love letters for me. Apparently, he's too busy with his store$2
Dialogue.Shane: I wouldn't mind if we skipped this festival.
Dialogue.Willy: An old captain like me will always love their ol' sea exploration machine.
Dialogue.Abigail: I really want to hug the teddy.
Dialogue.Robin: Whenever I dance with Demetrius, I feel like I just fell in love with him for the first time.$h
Dialogue.Demetrius: Being in love feels like being on drugs. Did you know that?
Dialogue.Maru: I wonder if it's possible to manipulate feelings using technology.
Dialogue.Sebastian: I wouldn't be here if mom didn't force me to.
Dialogue.Pierre: I highly recommend you to buy love letters at Pierre's.
Dialogue.Linus: I never received a love letter.$s#$b#I wonder if they still know about my existance.$s
Dialogue.George: Ahh... Love's in the air. This is better than any TV romance.$h
Dialogue.Lewis: Personally, this is the best Event of the year. I always enjoy the youth exchanging their feelings.$h
Dialogue.Emily: $y '@! Do you think you will receive a love letter?_Certainly._Well, I wish you good luck._I don't think so._Don't be sad. I'm pretty sure you will next year.'
Dialogue.Haley: I hope the person who is going to give me a love letter is dressed nicely.
Dialogue.Penny: Oh... hi @. I didn't expect you right now.
Dialogue.Pam: I just came for the pralines.
Dialogue.Jodi: Back then when I was a child, I used to love this festival.
Dialogue.Marnie: I hope I will receive a letter from someone special this year.
Dialogue.Leo: I always receive love letters from parrots... They're walnut's in this case though.
Dialogue.Vincent: Mom said im too young to understand this.$2
Dialogue.Jas: I wrote Vincent a letter.$h#$b#Don't tell him though.
Dialogue.Sandy: Oh, hi @.#$b#Are you excited for your letters? I'm pretty sure hard-working people are attractive.
Dialogue.Harvey: Love can truly be a medicine.
Dialogue.Wizard: Don't ask me for love spells.
Dialogue.Gus: If you're about to ask someone out, make sure to go to my place.$h
Dialogue.Leah: This event always reminds me of my ex.$s
Dialogue.Sam: Someday, I want to give a concert during the love letter ceremony.
Dialogue.Elliott: The Love Festival... It gives me new harmonies and a gentle touch to my mind. It's time to write a novel.
Dialogue.Kent: I really missed this event. It feels so right to be here again.$h
Dialogue.Marlon: Well, I thought I will keep some company today.
Dialogue.Haley_spouse: Guess who will receive my love letter.$h
Dialogue.Leah_spouse: This event used to make me sad because of my past experiences, but now with you, it's different.$h
Dialogue.Abigail_spouse: Since I can't hug the teddy, can I hug you instead?$h
Dialogue.Emily_spouse: Hi honey, I am creating your love letter right now.$h
Dialogue.Maru_spouse: One day, I will create a scientific letter for you
Dialogue.Penny_spouse: Hi honey, wanna do something after this?
Dialogue.Elliott_spouse: Love letters for you?#$b#How about I write a novel for you?
Dialogue.Alex_spouse: Do you want to have a romantic dinner after this?
Dialogue.Sebastian_spouse: In the past, I didn't enjoy attending this festival. Now it's the opposite.$h
Dialogue.Shane_spouse: It feels like my depression disappeared whenever I'm here with you.$h
Dialogue.Sam_spouse: If you want, I can play some romantic music for you.$h
Dialogue.Harvey_spouse: Oh hi @... I almost got a healthy heart attack.$h
Letter.NextDay: Dear @, ^Don't forget about the Love Festival tomorrow, starting at 9AM in the town.^Make sure you will give someone your love letter. ^-Mayor Lewis
Letter.WeekBefore: Dear @, ^The Love Festival will take place in a week. ^I hope you made enough friends this year... ^...otherwise you probably won't get anything. ^It starts at 9AM... don't miss out! ^-Major Lewis
LoveLetter.FoodMail: Hi @... < ^I really enjoy your company. I knew you're going to spice up the life in the valley. ^In order to show my gratitude, I made a meal for you <
LoveLetter.VegetableMail: Hey @... ^You probably don't know about it, but I love your farm animals. You also take a lot of care of them. ^That's why I gift you some vegetables. Perhaps, your animals will love them.
LoveLetter.MoneyMail: Dear @, ^Whenever you visit me, I know it's going to be a great day. Your presence always makes me smile <.^If you ever need someone to talk to, I will be there.
LoveLetter.CropMail: Hey @..., ^I'm truly impressed by your work on the farm < ^I am kinda jealous so I tried planting crops on my own but it didn't turn out very well... ^Thats why I'm giving you my remaining seeds. They will be in better hands.
LoveLetter.GemMail: Hi @... < ^I think it's time to reward you since you improve our lovely valley. ^You entertain all of us, especially me. I found this gem recently but I don't know what to do with it. I hope you will like it.
StartMessage.Question: Do you want to start?
ReceiveLetterReaction.Flattered: No way you chose me. I'm flattered$h
ReceiveLetterReaction.notExpected: Wow @, I would've never expected that.$h
npcGiftingLetter.WroteLetterForYou: Hi @, I wrote this letter for you. I hope you will like it.
npcGiftingLetter.AskValentine: Ehmmm..., @$h#$b#Do you want to become closer to each other? Look what I made for you.$h
npcGiftingLetter.ExpressFeelings: Hey @, I know you may feel something else but anyway, I just wanted to express my feelings for you.$h
npcGiftingLetter.Admire: Hey @...#$b#I always admired you and the job you do on your farm. It's pretty impressive and brings some live into the valley.#$b#That's why im giving you this.$h
MarnieReaction.Start: Alright @, it's time to receive your love letters.
MarnieReaction.NoLoveLetters: Well, seems like nobody wants to gift you some love letters this year.$s
JealousyDialogue.Spouse: By the way, I truly appreciate how you didn't give me your love letter...$s
